Reference version 0.0.0.1

All functions

changes

View Changes in Files under Version Control.

create_repo

Create a Repository for Version Control

go_to

Go to a Specified Snapshot in the Version Control Timeline

ignore

Add files or folders to list of ignored items

plot

Sets default plotting for timeline

print

Sets default print method for timeline

record

Record Changes in Files under Version Control.

reminder_delay

Set the reminder delay in minutes for commit reminder messages

retrieve

Retrieve code from a past commit.

scrub

Remove all unstaged changes

sync

Syncronize Changes in Files under Version Control.

timeline

Shows the commit log

unignore

Remove files or folders to list of ignored items

  • All functions
